tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Earned conditional status on the Mackenzie Tour...Runner-up to Matt Dobyns at the PGA Professional National Championship to earn an invitation to the PGA Championship in August at Whistling Straits (missed cut)...Earned a berth on the U.S. PGA Cup team.
tourBios.personal: Has worked in construction...Wants to play Augusta National and Pine Valley...His favorite pro sports team is the Minnesota Wild.

tourBios.carHigh: 2014: Won the Metropolitan PGA Professional Championship...Added a victory at the Metropolitan PGA Team Championship, playing with partner Chris Marinaro...Picked up a victory at the Metropolitan Assistants' Tour event at Redding CC.
tourBios.personal: Has worked in construction...Wants to play Augusta National and Pine Valley...His favorite pro sports team is the Minnesota Wild...Is an assistant professional at Deepdale GC in Manhasset, N.Y., working alongside occasional Champions Tour player Darrell Kestner.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T23rd in 2015 at the ATB Financial Classic.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T34th in Consecutive Cuts on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
